channel.title: Latest from Android Central
channel.description: All the latest content from the Android Central team

item.title: Oura's subscription isn't going away, and I get why

item.title: Google Pixel 10a vs. Pixel 9a: Will it be worth the upgrade?
item.description: The Google Pixel 10a should arrive in March with hopefully a better display, faster charging, and the same price. It's not expected to be a major overhaul over the 9a, so should you wait till March or pull the trigger now?

item.title: Motorola Edge 70 vs. Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: The pursuit of slimness
item.description: The Motorola Edge 70 is every bit as slim and light as the Galaxy S25 Edge, but is a lot cheaper and features a much bigger battery. If performance is not the main criteria, should you really be spending a premium on Samsung or does Motorola's offering check all the boxes?
